'''Dashing Through the Snow... and the Flames''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Meetings in Outrealm: Series III]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat [[Narukami Island: Tenshukaku|Signora]] in [[Co-Op Mode]].
<!--
==Gameplay Notes==
-->

==Trivia==
*The achievement's name is a reference to both the opening lyric of {{w|Jingle Bells}} and {{w|Through the Fire and Flames}} by {{w|DragonForce}}.
